events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role submitted by the candidate, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer, developer, and coding skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage candidate communications and track progress.
The candidate completed the initial screening interview which covered their experience with software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly expressing strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview and discussed availability.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week, focusing on coding skills, system design, and DevOps knowledge.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem solving and programming skills.
